title: Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt, Corduroy Cuffs
descriptions:
Introducing the Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel, the perfect shirt for our distinguished gentlemen! This Long Sleeve Plaid Button Down Casual Shirt is designed with your comfort and convenience in mind. 

Crafted from 100% Cotton, this imported shirt offers a relaxed fit that allows ease of movement without any pulling or tugging. The soft brushed cotton flannel fabric weighs 5.1 ounces, providing a pill-resistant and fade-resistant quality that ensures a sharp look and lasting comfort.

The Corduroy Cuffs and Corduroy Lined Collar add a touch of style and enhance the durability of the shirt. The double-pleated back design not only adds authenticity but also allows for optimal shape maintenance. 

Whether you prefer layering or standalone wear, this flannel shirt is suitable for both indoor and outdoor settings. The classic single pocket with a pencil slot provides storage options for your essentials, while also safeguarding your sunglasses.

We understand that caring for your shirt is important, so be sure to follow the care instructions for optimal shrinkage management. And don't worry about finding the right size, as our size chart reference will guide you in selecting the perfect fit.

Experience immediate out-of-the-box comfort with our Legendary Whitetails Men's Buck Camp Flannel. No break-in period required! Its fade resistance ensures that it will stay true to its images, maintaining its sharp look over time.

Don't miss out on this legendary flannel shirt that combines classic style, comfort, and durability. Get yours today and enjoy the utmost satisfaction with every wear.
